contents.text: R5 has to merge as well, and it will select the main LSP, since it has the FAST_REROUTE object. Thus, the detour LSP terminates at R5.
contents.zh-CHS: R5也必须合并，并且它将选择主LSP，因为它有FAST_REROUTE对象。因此，迂回LSP终止于R5。

contents.text: 7.1.3. Message Handling for Merged Detours
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.3. 合并迂回的消息处理

contents.text: When an LSR receives a ResvTear for an LSP, the LSR must determine whether it has an alternate associated LSP. For instance, if the ResvTear was received for a protected LSP but an associated backup LSP has not received a ResvTear, then the LSR has an alternate associated LSP. If the LSR does not have an alternate associated LSP, then the MP MUST propagate the ResvTear toward the LSP's ingress, and, for each backup LSP merged into that LSP at this LSR, the ResvTear SHOULD also be propagated along the backup LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 当LSR收到LSP的ResvTear时，LSR必须确定其是否具有备用关联LSP。例如，如果收到受保护LSP的ResvTear，但关联的备份LSP尚未收到ResvTear，则LSR具有备用关联LSP。如果LSR没有备用关联LSP，则MP必须向LSP入口传播ResvTear，并且，对于在该LSR处合并到该LSP中的每个备份LSP，ResvTear也应沿备份LSP传播。

contents.text: The MP may receive PathTear messages for some of the merging LSPs. PathTear messages SHOULD NOT be propagated downstream until the MP has received PathTear messages for each of the merged LSPs. However, the fact that one or more of the merged LSPs has been torn down should be reflected in the downstream message, such as by changing the DETOUR object, if there is one.
contents.zh-CHS: MP可能会接收一些合并LSP的Path撕裂消息。在MP接收到每个合并LSP的PathTear消息之前，不应向下游传播PathTear消息。但是，一个或多个合并的LSP已被拆除的事实应反映在下游消息中，例如通过更改迂回对象（如果存在）来反映。

contents.text: 7.2. Handling Failures
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 处理故障

contents.text: When a downstream LSR detects a local link failure, for any protected LSPs routed over the failed link, Path and Resv state MUST NOT be cleared, and PathTear and ResvErr messages MUST NOT be sent immediately. If this is not the case, then the facility backup method will not work. Furthermore, a downstream LSR SHOULD reset the
contents.zh-CHS: 当下游LSR检测到本地链路故障时，对于通过故障链路路由的任何受保护LSP，不得清除Path和Resv状态，也不得立即发送PATHTRARE和ResvErr消息。如果不是这样，那么设施备份方法将不起作用。此外，下游LSR应重置

contents.text: refresh timers for these LSPs as if they had just been refreshed. This is to allow time for the PLR to begin refreshing state via the bypass tunnel. State MUST be removed if it has not been refreshed before the refresh timer expires. This allows the facility backup method to work without requiring that it signal backup paths through the bypass tunnel before failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 刷新这些LSP的计时器，就像它们刚刚被刷新一样。这是为了让PLR有时间通过旁通通道开始刷新状态。如果在刷新计时器过期之前未刷新状态，则必须将其删除。这使得设施备份方法能够工作，而无需在故障前通过旁通隧道向备份路径发送信号。

contents.text: After a failure has occurred, the MP must still send Resv messages for the backup LSPs associated with the protected LSPs that have failed. If the backup LSP was sent through a bypass tunnel, then the PHOP object in its Path message will have the IP address of the associated PLR. This will ensure that Resv state is refreshed.
contents.zh-CHS: 发生故障后，MP仍必须为与发生故障的受保护LSP关联的备份LSP发送Resv消息。如果备份LSP是通过旁路隧道发送的，则其Path消息中的PHOP对象将具有相关PLR的IP地址。这将确保刷新Resv状态。

contents.text: Once the local link has recovered, the MP may or may not accept Path messages for existing protected LSPs that had failed over to their backup.
contents.zh-CHS: 本地链路恢复后，MP可能会也可能不会接受故障转移到其备份的现有受保护LSP的路径消息。

contents.text: 8. Behavior of All LSRs
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 所有LSR的行为

contents.text: The objects and methods defined in this document require behavior from all LSRs in the traffic-engineered network, even if an LSR is not along the path of a protected LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中定义的对象和方法需要流量工程网络中所有LSR的行为，即使LSR不在受保护LSP的路径上。

contents.text: First, if a DETOUR object is included in the backup LSP's path message for the sender template-specific method, the LSRs in the traffic-engineered network should support the DETOUR object.
contents.zh-CHS: 首先，如果发送方模板特定方法的备份LSP路径消息中包含迂回对象，则流量工程网络中的LSR应支持迂回对象。

contents.text: Second, if the path-specific method is to be supported for the one-to-one backup method, it is necessary that the LSRs in the traffic-engineered network be capable of merging detours as specified in Section 8.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 其次，如果一对一备份方法支持路径特定方法，则交通工程网络中的LSR必须能够按照第8.1节的规定合并绕道。

contents.text: It is possible to avoid specific LSRs that do not support this behavior by assigning a link attribute to all the links of those LSPs and then requesting that backup paths exclude this link attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过为这些LSP的所有链接分配链接属性，然后请求备份路径排除此链接属性，可以避免不支持此行为的特定LSR。

contents.text: 8.1. Merging Detours in the Path-Specific Method
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. 在路径特定方法中合并迂回路线

contents.text: If multiple Path Messages for different detours are received with the same SESSION, SENDER_TEMPLATE, outgoing interface, and next-hop LSR, then the LSR must function as a Detour Merge Point and merge the detour Path Messages. This merging should occur as specified in Section 7.1.2 and shown in Example 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果使用同一会话、发送方\模板、传出接口和下一跳LSR接收到不同绕行的多条路径消息，则LSR必须用作绕行合并点并合并绕行路径消息。该合并应按照第7.1.2节的规定和示例4所示进行。

contents.text: In addition, it is necessary to update the DETOUR object to reflect the merging that has taken place. This is done using the following algorithm to format the outgoing DETOUR object for the final LSP:
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，有必要更新迂回对象以反映已发生的合并。使用以下算法为最终LSP格式化传出绕行对象：

contents.text: - Combine all the (PLR_ID, Avoid_Node_ID) pairs from all the DETOUR objects of all merged LSPs into a new object. Ordering is insignificant.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将所有合并LSP的所有迂回对象中的所有（PLR_ID、回避_节点_ID）对合并为一个新对象。排序无关紧要。

contents.text: 9. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document does not introduce new security issues. The security considerations pertaining to the original RSVP protocol [RSVP] remain relevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档不会引入新的安全问题。与原始RSVP协议[RSVP]相关的安全注意事项仍然相关。

contents.text: Note that the facility backup method requires that a PLR and its selected merge point trust RSVP messages received from each other.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，设施备份方法要求PLR及其所选合并点信任从彼此接收的RSVP消息。

contents.text: 10. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 10. IANA考虑

contents.text: IANA [RFC-IANA] has assigned the following RSVP Class Numbers for objects defined in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA[RFC-IANA]已为本文档中定义的对象分配了以下RSVP类编号。

contents.text: 10.1. DETOUR Object
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. 迂回目标

contents.text: IANA has assigned:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已分配：

contents.text: 63 DETOUR
contents.zh-CHS: 63绕道

contents.text: Class Types or C-Types:
contents.zh-CHS: 类别类型或C类型：

contents.text: 7 IPv4 8 IPv6
contents.zh-CHS: 7 IPv4 8 IPv6

contents.text: Future C-Types will be assigned using the following guidelines:
contents.zh-CHS: 未来的C类型将使用以下指南进行分配：

contents.text: C-Types 0 through 127 are assigned by Standards Action.
contents.zh-CHS: C类型0到127由标准行动分配。

contents.text: C-Types 128 through 191 are assigned by Expert Review.
contents.zh-CHS: C型128至191由专家评审分配。

contents.text: C-Types 192 through 255 are reserved for Vendor Private Use.
contents.zh-CHS: C型192至255保留供供应商私人使用。

contents.text: For C-Types in the range 192 through 255, the first four octets of the DETOUR object after the C-Type must be the Vendor's SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Code (see [ENT]) in network byte order.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于范围从192到255的C-Type，C-Type之后的迂回对象的前四个八位字节必须是供应商的SMI网络管理专用企业代码（请参见[ENT]），按网络字节顺序排列。

contents.text: 10.2. FAST_REROUTE Object
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. 快速重路由对象

contents.text: IANA has assigned:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已分配：

contents.text: 205 FAST_REROUTE
contents.zh-CHS: 205快速重新路由

contents.text: Class Types or C-Types:
contents.zh-CHS: 类别类型或C类型：

contents.text: 1 FAST_REROUTE Type 1 7 RESERVED
contents.zh-CHS: 1快速路由类型1 7保留

contents.text: In the FAST_REROUTE object, C-Type 7 is reserved as it is still used by pre-standard implementations. Future C-Types will be assigned using the following guidelines:
contents.zh-CHS: 在FAST_REROUTE对象中，C-type7是保留的，因为它仍然被标准前的实现使用。未来的C类型将使用以下指南进行分配：

contents.text: C-Types 0 through 127 are assigned by Standards Action.
contents.zh-CHS: C类型0到127由标准行动分配。

contents.text: C-Types 128 through 191 are assigned by Expert Review.
contents.zh-CHS: C型128至191由专家评审分配。

contents.text: C-Types 192 through 255 are reserved for Vendor Private Use.
contents.zh-CHS: C型192至255保留供供应商私人使用。

contents.text: For C-Types in the range 192 through 255, the first four octets of the FAST_REROUTE object after the C-Type must be the Vendor's SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Code (see [ENT]) in network byte order.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于范围从192到255的C类型，C类型之后的FAST_REROUTE对象的前四个八位字节必须是供应商的SMI网络管理专用企业代码（请参见[ENT]），按网络字节顺序排列。
